channel.description: Recent content on Today's Prayer Site

item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: April 2, 2023 Today's Verse John 1:1–3 [1] In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God. [2] He was in the beginning with God. [3] All things were made through him, and without him was not any thing made that was made. Today's Memory Verse 2 Corinthians 12:9 - But he said to me, “My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.
